solution_line_template: For the red folder, {sheets_per_folder} sheets of paper get {red_folder_stickers_per_sheet} stickers each, for a total of {sheets_per_folder}*{red_folder_stickers_per_sheet}=<<{sheets_per_folder}*{red_folder_stickers_per_sheet}={red_folder_total_stickers}>>{red_folder_total_stickers} stickers.

For the green folder, {sheets_per_folder} sheets of paper get {green_folder_stickers_per_sheet} stickers each, for a total of {sheets_per_folder}*{green_folder_stickers_per_sheet}=<<{sheets_per_folder}*{green_folder_stickers_per_sheet}={green_folder_total_stickers}>>{green_folder_total_stickers} stickers.

For the blue folder, {sheets_per_folder} sheets of paper get {blue_folder_stickers_per_sheet} sticker each, for a total of {sheets_per_folder}*{blue_folder_stickers_per_sheet}=<<{sheets_per_folder}*{blue_folder_stickers_per_sheet}={blue_folder_total_stickers}>>{blue_folder_total_stickers} stickers.
